Mandate: Collect taxes from mining, trade, and services to fund public investment in healthcare, education, and infrastructure.
TopPriorities: Close transfer pricing and VAT refund gaps in mining value chain.
Modernize compliance data ingestion tying customs to domestic invoices.
Support SMEs with risk-based audits to free staff for high-risk sectors.
ActiveOperations: Task forces combining court evidence with analytics on entities.
Machine-learning VAT refund scanners matching freight manifests to declarations.
Stakeholder roadshows explaining obligations under new tax schedules.

RecentActions.Title: Enhanced tax compliance measures
RecentActions.Summary: Implemented new systems to detect and prevent tax evasion.

RecentActions.Title: Presented revenue analysis to government
RecentActions.Summary: AI-based alerts triggered joint briefings with partner agencies.

Support SMEs with risk-based audits to free staff for high-risk sectors.
ActiveOperations: Task forces combining court evidence with analytics on entities.
Machine-learning VAT refund scanners matching freight manifests to declarations.
Stakeholder roadshows explaining obligations under new tax schedules.

RecentActions.Title: Enhanced tax compliance measures
RecentActions.Summary: Implemented new systems to detect and prevent tax evasion.

RecentActions.Title: Presented revenue analysis to government
RecentActions.Summary: AI-based alerts triggered joint briefings with partner agencies.
